doc:
Luther Adler https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Luther_Adler 0 Luther Adler (May 4, 1903 – December 8, 1984) was an American actor best known for his work in theatre, but who also worked in film and television. He also directed plays on Broadway. Luther_Adler ( May_4_,_1903 – December_8_,_1984 ) was an_American_actor best_known for his_work in theatre , but who also worked in film_and_television . He also directed plays on Broadway .
